personalInfo.name: Divya Monga
personalInfo.title: AI Student | ML & DL Developer | Full Stack Innovator
personalInfo.tagline: Passionate about applying AI to solve real-world problems

summary: Motivated AI student with expertise in Python, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, NLP and Neural Networks. Experienced in data preprocessing, model training, optimization, and deployment. Passionate about applying AI to solve real-world problems and contributing to innovative GenAI-driven projects.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Designed and deployed a fully responsive website to enhance the institute's digital presence and user engagement
Developed frontend using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and integrated backend workflows in Flask/Python for smooth content updates
Improved website load speed and accessibility by optimizing UI components and responsive layouts across all devices

projects.name: Google Cloud GenAI Hackathon
projects.description: Built 5 GenAI applications (marketing pipeline, multimodal RAG insights, AI Chef app, bouquet generator, video analyzer) using Vertex AI, Gemini, Imagen, Docker, Cloud Run, and Streamlit, achieving 40% faster campaign automation.

projects.name: AI Chatbot | Hugging Face Spaces
projects.description: Built a lightweight conversational AI using Gradio + Transformers, deployed on Hugging Face Spaces; optimized runtime and execution memory usage by 45%, enabling smooth CPU-only inference.

projects.name: Face Recognition Attendance System
projects.description: Achieved 92% accuracy using LBPH + OpenCV for real-time attendance logging.

projects.name: Sentiment Analysis
projects.description: Classified 10,000+ reviews with 91% accuracy using NLP pipelines + VADER.

projects.name: American Express Exit Prediction
projects.description: Developed and trained an Artificial Neural Network in TensorFlow on a dataset of 9,930 rows to predict American Express user exits, achieving 80% accuracy through feature engineering, one-hot encoding, and data scaling.

projects.name: Fake News Detection
projects.description: Built a BERT-based Fake News Detection model using PyTorch & Hugging Face, achieving high accuracy with automated pipelines, benchmarking (PyCarets), and performance visualization.

achievements.title: AI Skills Passport - EY & Microsoft
achievements.description: Earned AI Skills Passport, credited by EY & Microsoft, for expertise in AI fundamentals, ethics, and business applications

achievements.title: Google Gen AI Exchange Program - Top 10
achievements.description: Ranked among Top 10 in the Gold League in Google Gen AI Exchange Program

achievements.title: Adobe Hackathon Winner
achievements.description: Team Lead for ADOBE HACKATHON (AI Document Summarizer)

faqs.question: What are Divya's main skills?
faqs.answer: Divya specializes in Python, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Neural Networks, NLP, Computer Vision, and Full Stack Development using Flask and React.

faqs.question: Tell me about Divya's education
faqs.answer: Divya is pursuing B.E. in Robotics and AI from Thapar Institute of Engineering & Technology (2023-2027) with a CGPA of 8.87/10.

faqs.question: What projects has Divya worked on?
faqs.answer: Divya has built multiple AI/ML projects including Google Cloud GenAI Hackathon apps, AI Chatbot on Hugging Face, Face Recognition System, Sentiment Analysis, American Express Exit Prediction using Neural Networks, and Fake News Detection using BERT.

faqs.question: What are Divya's achievements?
faqs.answer: Divya has earned AI Skills Passport from EY & Microsoft, ranked Top 10 in Google Gen AI Exchange Program, led ADOBE HACKATHON winning team, and solved 110+ LeetCode problems.

faqs.question: What work experience does Divya have?
faqs.answer: Divya worked as a Full Stack Developer at Yog Sadhna Kendra Ferozepur NGO (Jun-Aug 2025), where she designed and deployed a fully responsive website, developed frontend and backend workflows, and optimized performance.
